page.title: 19 RUGELEY HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: Rugeley Health Centre was opened on the 21st.March, 1967. In the Centre there are 8 surgeries with examination rooms attached. There are 12 doctors. Many clinics are held including Ante-natal, Post-natal, Child health, Dental, Speech therapy, Hearing, Chiropody and School Clinics. The area covered by the Centre includes Little Haywood, Colwich, Colton, and Longdon. There is also a branch surgery at Armitage which covers Armitage, Handsacre and Hill Ridware. No chemists are attached to the Centre but three chemist shops are on a rota. The number of people who use the centre each week varies considerably. The numberof people registered with the doctors is confidential.
